table.name: quest_student_ranking
table.comment: Recommender (teacher and counselor) rankings and information about their connection to the student.

field.name: id
field.comment: Primary key.

field.name: target_contact_id
field.comment: The contact (student) being ranked. FK to Contact ID.

field.name: source_contact_id
field.comment: The contact (recommender) submitting the ranking. FK to Contact ID.

field.name: department
field.comment: Recommender school department.

field.name: relationship_id
field.title: Relationship to this Student
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_relationship option group values.

field.name: relationship_other
field.comment: Describes relationship of relationship_id label is Other.

field.name: teacher_years
field.comment: Number of years person has been a teacher (teacher ranking form only).

field.name: teacher_subjects
field.comment: In what subjects have you taught this student (teacher ranking form only).

field.name: teacher_grade
field.comment: What grade(s) given to student (teacher ranking form only).

field.name: counselor_years
field.comment: Number of years counselor has known this student (counselor ranking form only).

field.name: counselor_capacity
field.comment: In what capacity has counselor known this student (counselor ranking form only).

field.name: counselor_meet
field.comment: How often does counselor meet with this student (counselor ranking form only).

field.name: counselor_basis
field.comment: This evaluation is based on... Multi-select checkbox array populates a delimited list civicrm_option_value IDs. Available options have civicrm_option_group.name = counselor_basis (counselor ranking form only).

field.name: counselor_basis_other
field.comment: Describes other basis of counselor eval (counselor ranking form only).

field.name: leadership_id
field.title: Relationship to this Student
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: intellectual_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: challenge_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: maturity_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: work_ethic_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: originality_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: humor_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: energy_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: respect_differences_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: respect_faculty_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: respect_peers_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: compare_academic_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: compare_extracurricular_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: compare_personal_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: compare_overall_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommender_ranking option group values.

field.name: recommend_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value. Uses recommend_student option group values.
